data.title: News – UpperCut Witley
data.text:
Being part of the community for over 30 years we wish to play our part in providing community help during his time. If you know of anyone who needs our help or support even if it is just a friendly phone, then please do let us know and we will be happy to do whatever we can. Please click here for information which may be of help especially if you know anyone who may be struggling. With love from Uppercut

Introducing LVL Enhance Lash Lift…

LVL Enhance is the revolutionary natural lash treatment taking the beauty industry by storm.

LVL straightens your natural eyelashes at the root, so unlike a traditional lash perm it creates the effect of longer, lifted lashes and they’ll stay that way for six to eight weeks. The results are immediate, plus the added lash colour boost creates a mascara-type effect so you are always ready to go.

Free Hair Conditioning Treatment

Enjoy a professional salon treatment for FREE. With all colour services before the end of November 2016 we are offering a complimentary L’Oréal Powerdose treatment worth £5.00.

This is a wonderful treatment for coloured hair with long lasting results to restore and prolong the colour of the hair. It will make your hair easier to style and regain a softer silkier natural feel, sealing in colour and enhancing shine. Book your colour service with a free conditioning treatment now!

Salon News

A big thank you for the overwhelmingly positive response to our first email newsletter and if you have any further comments, ideas, suggestions regarding anything you would like to see included in future editions then please contact Michael on michael@uppercutwitley.com

Over the next few months we have several new and exciting things to share with you regarding the salon and by continuing to view our email newsletters you will be one of the first to find out what’s happening. In our next newsletter we will also have a number of top ideas to help you relax and enjoy a stress free Christmas.

Beauty Open Day

Tuesday 21st June 9.30 am to 5.30 pm

To celebrate the success of our new beauty rooms we are having an open day when we will be offering the following treatments for only £10:

ESPA Back, Neck & Shoulder Massage (25 minutes)

ESPA Express Facial (25 minutes)

Jessica Nail Care Re-varnish Hands (30 minutes)

Sienna X Full Body Spray Tan

There will also be “one day only” offers including:

A minimum 20% discount on beauty products

Free gifts with purchase

Goody bags

Raffle prizes

Complimentary refreshments

To ensure you do not miss out, please make your booking now, either at salon reception or by calling 01428 682676

Are you Witley’s Next Top Model?

We continually wish to develop our team and are currently looking for models to help with this. Therefore if you or anyone you know wish to look good for less then please contact us to benefit from discounts of at least 50%!

Salon News

Many thanks to everyone who has taken the time to tell us how much they are enjoying the improvements we have been making to the salon. We will continue to work hard on developing the business to give you the best experience possible.
